about.title: San Antonio's HVAC Team
about.subtitle: Keeping Bexar County comfortable since 2016.
about.description:
Cool Right AC & Heating was founded right here in San Antonio with a simple idea: HVAC service should be honest, affordable, and done right. What started as a two-person operation has grown into one of the most trusted names in San Antonio HVAC — not by cutting corners, but by treating every home like our own.

Our technicians are NATE-certified and trained on all major brands including Trane, Carrier, Lennox, and Goodman. We serve homeowners, property managers, and small businesses across the San Antonio metro from Alamo Heights to Helotes.

cta.title: Don't Sweat It — Call Cool Right
cta.description: Whether it's a broken AC in July or a heater that won't kick on in January, we've got you covered. Free estimates, financing available.
